sentences.english: The heat generated in the compression phase is normally radiated into the air outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 壓縮階段產生熱量一般被輻射到建築物外的空氣中。

sentences.english: Wen was eating japanese seafood at the crisis area.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶在喫日本輻射區海鮮。

sentences.english: Tritium emits a weak form of radiation that does not travel very far in the air and cannot penetrate the skin.
sentences.chinese: 氚發出的輻射很弱，在空氣傳播不遠，不能穿透皮膚。

sentences.english: Especially since the game is ten times as customisable.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在輻射三的開放性還要大十倍的情況下。

sentences.english: A full-body CT scan gives a radiation dose of 20-30 millisieverts.
sentences.chinese: 一次全身CT掃描的輻射劑量是20～30毫希弗。

sentences.english: The radiant ceiling cooling is a new technology with higher comfortable degree in the air-conditioning field.
sentences.chinese: 樓板輻射供冷是一種舒適度很高的新型空調技術。

sentences.english: The concepts of radiant emittance and of irradiance are complementary.
sentences.chinese: 輻射的發射強度和輻照度是兩個互補的概念。

sentences.english: At very high intensities, nuclear radiations cause itching and tingling of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 當核輻射強度很高時，它能使皮膚感到發癢和刺痛。

sentences.english: Black carbon absorbs solar radiation, warming the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 炭黑吸收陽光輻射，讓大氣增溫。

sentences.english: The cuting-to-Vary direction radiation pattern illustrates tha…
sentences.chinese: 用多切割面輻射方向圖描述該天線的全向性。

sentences.english: This article introduces a gun type of gas burners for radiating tube and a method of designing combustion unit for radiating tube.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種槍式輻射管燃氣燃燒器及其燃燒頭的設計。

sentences.english: Residents of the U. S. do not need to take iodine pills to prevent radiation-induced thyroid cancer.
sentences.chinese: 美國居民無須服用碘片來預防輻射造成的甲狀腺癌症。
這個過程叫做光能輻射。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of marine algal polysaccharide on immune function of irradiated mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察海藻多糖對輻射損傷小鼠免疫功能的影響。

sentences.english: Elephant trunk-like dust pillars point towards the hot blue stars and are tell-tale signs of their eroding effect.
sentences.chinese: 指向藍色熱星的象鼻狀塵埃柱是輻射侵蝕效果的證據。

sentences.english: Materials through which no radiation is propagated are called opaque .
sentences.chinese: 輻射線不能透過的物質叫不透明體。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to shift/to divert or distract (attention etc)/to change/to transform/metastasis (medicine)/to evacuate (people)
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
